transArray.content:
Very good, well-equipped and full of surprises, comfortable bathrobes
The quality of all the facilities and supplies is quite good, around 400 yuan can be said to be very cost-effective in the location of Sanyuan Bridge
The breakfast is very good, but there are few changes, and there are not many vegetables. After three days, I feel a little tired; the hot wontons for supper make people very warm, absolutely praise
Will come again if needed
